mapper.select: SELECT user_address.address_id, user_address.recipient_name, user_address.contact_number, user_address.province, user_address.city, user_address.area, user_address.detailed_address, user_address.postal_code, t_order_info.id, t_order_info.title, t_order_info.total_fee, t_order_info.order_status, t_order_info.create_time, t_suborder_order_info.suborder_id, t_suborder_order_info.product_id, t_suborder_order_info.sum, t_product.product_id, t_product.product_name, t_product.price, t_product.product_url, t_product.product_description, t_product.discount, t_product.sales FROM user_address INNER JOIN t_order_info ON user_address.address_id = t_order_info.address_id INNER JOIN t_suborder_order_info ON t_order_info.id = t_suborder_order_info.order_father, t_product where t_order_info.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT t_order_info.id, t_order_info.title, t_order_info.order_no, t_order_info.open_id, t_order_info.create_time, t_order_info.order_status, sys_user.nick_name, sys_user.phonenumber FROM t_order_info INNER JOIN sys_user ON t_order_info.user_id = sys_user.user_id
and t_order_info.id like concat('%',#{orderId},'%')
and t_order_info.order_status = #{orderState}
and sys_user.phonenumber like concat('%',#{userPhone},'%')

SELECT t_order_info.id, t_order_info.title, t_order_info.order_status, t_order_info.total_fee, user_address.address_id, user_address.recipient_name, user_address.user_id, user_address.contact_number, user_address.province, user_address.city, user_address.area, user_address.detailed_address, user_address.postal_code, user_address.is_default FROM user_address INNER JOIN t_order_info ON user_address.address_id = t_order_info.address_id where t_order_info.id = #{orderId}

SELECT user_address.address_id, user_address.recipient_name, user_address.contact_number, user_address.province, user_address.city, user_address.area, user_address.detailed_address, user_address.postal_code, t_order_info.id, t_order_info.title, t_order_info.total_fee, t_order_info.order_status, t_order_info.create_time, t_suborder_order_info.suborder_id, t_suborder_order_info.product_id, t_suborder_order_info.sum, t_product.product_id, t_product.product_name, t_product.price, t_product.product_url, t_product.product_description, t_product.discount, t_product.sales FROM user_address INNER JOIN t_order_info ON user_address.address_id = t_order_info.address_id INNER JOIN t_suborder_order_info ON t_order_info.id = t_suborder_order_info.order_father, t_product where t_order_info.id = #{id}
